credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: drawing: Sketches: A. A classical sacrifice. B. God the Father
medium: A. pen, ink. Brush, bistre, brown ink, brown wash, white gouache. B. Black crayon.
description: Horizontal rectangle. A) the small altar stands in front of a colonnade, in the central part of which a statue stands. Four preists are beside the altar. In the foreground are at left women with children, dancing girls and an offering woman. From right comes a man with a a ram and other offerers. Beginning of another drawing at right. A frame is shown at left and below. Most of the obverse is colored brown. Reverse: B) Vertically above: God the father flying above the earth. Below: at left: The Creation of the Animals. At right: Division of Light and Darkness.
name: drawing: Sketches: A. A classical sacrifice. B. God the Father
